DOC.brief_title: The Healthy Eating Choices Life Program
DOC.detailed_description: Given current prevalence overweight obesity among adult United States project increase condition future , development effective weight loss weight loss maintenance strategy imperative . For weight loss occur , energy intake need reduce incur energy deficit , successful weight loss maintenance , energy intake need remain low energy intake pre-weight loss level due overall reduction body size reduces basal metabolic rate . One dietary strategy may facilitate weight loss maintenance consume diet low dietary energy density ( ED ) . This pilot study test effect dietary prescription focus ED . All participant investigation receive standard 12-week behavioral obesity intervention . The intervention include activity goal participant gradually work achieve course 12-week intervention along standard behavioral weight loss strategy . One condition receive dietary prescription weight loss focus solely lower ED diet , another condition receive traditional dietary prescription use behavioral weight loss intervention reduce energy intake , third condition receive prescription . Pre post intervention measurement take determine difference group .
DOC.criteria: Age 21 65 year Body mass index ( BMI ) 25 45 kg/m2 Report health condition Physical Activity Readiness Questionnaire ( PARQ ) Report unable walk 2 block ( 1/4 mile ) without stop Report major psychiatric diseases/organic brain syndrome via phone screen Are currently participate weight loss program and/or take weight loss medication lose > 5 % body weight past 6 month Intend move another city within time frame investigation Are pregnant , lactate , less 6 month postpartum , plan become pregnant time frame investigation Have gastric surgery weight loss
